attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
I REQUEST THAT THIS GOVERMENT UPHOLD ITS DUTY TO STAND UP FOR THE PEOPLE BORN AND LIVING IN THIS COUNTRY.
TO THE EFFECT OF SAFEGUARDING JOBS IN THIS COUNTRY SOLELY FOR THE PEOLPE OF THIS COUNRY ,AND TO ENSURE THAT IN TIMES OF ECONOMIC STRUGGLE THAT IT LOOKS AFTER ITS OWN NATIONALS BEFORE SPENDING MONEY ELSEWHERE IN THE WORLD!
AND ALSO THAT DURING THE TIMES OF MASS UNEMPLOYMENT IT SHOULD BE MADE ILLEGAL TO EMPLOY IMMIGRANT WORKFORCE BEFORE BRITISH NATIONALS!
THE DUTY OF THE GOVERMENT IS TO THE QUEEN AND THE PEOPLE OF THIS COUNTRY AND I CALL UPON THIS GOVERMENT TO ACT ACCORDINGLY IN TIMES OF ECONOMIC STRUGGLE AND TO LOOK AFTER OUR OWN PEOPLE FIRST AND FOREMOST !

rejection.details:
Your title should be a clear call for action, preferably starting with a verb, and not a name or statement.

Please address the excessive use of capital letters; they make your petition hard to read.
reasons: Wording that needs to be amended, or is impossible to understand
Statements that don't actually request any action
